solution_line_template: If Mr. Jones has {shirts_per_pant} shirts for every pair of pants, and he has {num_pants} pants, the total number of shirts he has is {shirts_per_pant}*{num_pants} =<<{shirts_per_pant}*{num_pants}={num_shirts}>>{num_shirts}
The total number of pieces of clothes he owns is {num_shirts}+{num_pants} = <<{num_shirts}+{num_pants}={total_clothes}>>{total_clothes}
